price: Nokorε sε nsεnkyerεnee wͻ woi mu, nanso wᴐn mu dodoͻ no ara nnye nni.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
